description: The Sea Train terminal in Water 7 where the Puffing Tom stops. It serves as the main transportation hub for citizens traveling between islands and becomes extremely crowded when Aqua Laguna approaches as residents evacuate.

keyEvents.title: CP9 Arrives at Blue Station
keyEvents.description: Rob Lucci leads CP9 to Blue Station with the captured Franky and Usopp to board the Puffing Tom.
keyEvents.significance: The gathering point where CP9 assembles with their captives before departing Water 7.

keyEvents.title: Robin Boards the Sea Train
keyEvents.description: Robin is escorted onto the Puffing Tom by Marine guards, complying without resistance despite her ability to fight back.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Robin's transport to Enies Lobby begins, marking a critical turning point in the arc.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Secretly Boards the Train
keyEvents.description: Sanji makes the decision to secretly board the Puffing Tom alone from this station to protect Robin.
keyEvents.significance: Blue Station is where Sanji's solo infiltration mission begins.

keyEvents.title: The Puffing Tom Departs
keyEvents.description: The sea train departs Blue Station, carrying Robin, Franky, Usopp, CP9, and the secretly-boarded Sanji to Enies Lobby.
keyEvents.significance: The critical departure that triggers the entire Enies Lobby rescue mission.

keyEvents.title: Nami Arrives Too Late
keyEvents.description: Nami arrives at Blue Station just as the sea train departs, tearfully calling out to Robin as the train disappears from sight.
keyEvents.significance: The emotional climax of the episode, showing the crew's failure to prevent Robin's departure and cementing their resolve for rescue.

description: A city known as the home of the world's best shipwrights. Instead of roads, it has canals and inhabitants travel using 'Bulls' (a type of sea horse). The city is threatened annually by the Aqua Laguna tidal wave.

keyEvents.title: Paulie Clears the Straw Hats' Name
keyEvents.description: Paulie helps clear the Straw Hat Pirates' name with the mob of workers and citizens.
keyEvents.significance: Turns the tide of public opinion in Water 7 from hostile to supportive of the Straw Hats.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Gets Stuck Between Buildings
keyEvents.description: Luffy becomes jammed between two buildings in Water 7's unique architecture while trying to reach the station.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Water 7's distinctive vertical cityscape and prevents Luffy from reaching Robin in time.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Gets Stuck in Chimney
keyEvents.description: Zoro faceplants into a chimney while leaping across Water 7's rooftops.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the complexity of navigating Water 7's unique urban layout.

description: The second sea train built by Tom, improved from the prototype Rocketman. It travels the track connecting Water 7, St. Poplar, San Faldo, Pucci, and Enies Lobby. The train can push through even the Aqua Laguna storm.

keyEvents.title: Robin Boards Without Resistance
keyEvents.description: Robin boards the Puffing Tom and allows herself to be taken to Enies Lobby.
keyEvents.significance: The train becomes the vessel carrying Robin to her fate at Enies Lobby.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Secretly Boards
keyEvents.description: Sanji infiltrates the Puffing Tom to protect Robin and attempt a rescue.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the sea train battle sequence.

keyEvents.title: Franky and Usopp Beaten by Guards
keyEvents.description: Inside the Puffing Tom, Franky and Usopp are beaten by Marine guards.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the hostile environment aboard the train for the captives.

keyEvents.title: Departs for Enies Lobby
keyEvents.description: The Puffing Tom begins its journey from Water 7 to Enies Lobby with Robin, Franky, Usopp, CP9, and Sanji aboard.
keyEvents.significance: The train's departure is the catalyst for the Enies Lobby arc.

name.japanese: ガレーラカンパニー本社

description: The main headquarters of the Galley-La Company, the premier shipbuilding company in Water 7. Iceburg's office is located here.

keyEvents.title: Iceburg Reveals Train Details
keyEvents.description: At Galley-La Headquarters, Iceburg informs Nami and Chopper about the sea train's departure time and destination.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the Straw Hats receive critical intelligence about Robin's transport.
